TextBody:
Hello Anya,

Thank you for your time on your call earlier.  As mentioned in our call I will open an internal case with our R&D team and request their feedback and next steps to be applied.
As discussed on our call, please do send me the epp client logs after you have made the changes to the Content Aware Protection policies so that I can also submit the logs to our developers for further analysis.


Kind regards
